actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an excise tax exemption for experimental aircraft.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include antique, experimental, and home-built aircraft within the exemption from fuel excise taxes granted to government chartered air museums operated exclusively for the procurement, care, and exhibition of World War II combat or transport aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an excise tax exemption for experimental aircraft.
